title: Bioformulation of mineral solubilizing microbes as novel microbial consortium for the growth promotion of wheat (Triticum aestivum) under the controlled and natural conditions
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Rubee Devi, Tanvir Kaur, Rajeshwari Negi, Divjot Kour, Sanjeev Kumar, Ashok Yadav, Sangram Singh, Kundan Kumar Chaubey, Ashutosh Kumar Rai, Sheikh Shreaz, Ajar Nath Yadav
